18.text: and those who lay hold of her

28.text: when you already have the means

11.text: At the end of your life

1.text: if you have struck hands in pledge

17.text: and those who seek me early

36.text: But he who fails to find me

2.text: but the one who is devious

3.text: brings a rod to his back

9.text: but he who brings it up

19.text: you will have to do so again

14.text: he who is under the wrath

25.text: and may she who gave you birth
with those who convict the guilty

17.text: and he will give you rest

10.text: and you will bear the guilt
